name: kofax
description: Integrates Kofax Roboter Process Automation with Cognigy.AI

scripts.zip: tar cfz Cognigy-Extension.${npm_package_name}.${npm_package_version}.tar.gz build/* package.json package-lock.json README.md icon.png
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run lint && npm run zip

author: Cognigy GmbH
